1.0.name: wordpress/faqs-manager
1.0.description:
With IndiaNIC FAQs, you can easily manage frequently asked questions on your website. This assists you with a remarkable feature of adding as many questions and related answers, which in turn, will serve as a forum and may help in bringing a huge traffic to your site. Moreover, there is no knowledge of PHP required; you can simply install the plug-in and you are done.

Features:

  • Question Answer Categories- you can categorize and give the title to specific group of questions and answers
  • You can supervise your FAQ group, filter and can search for FAQs group from admin panel
  • Customized CSS and Java Script for FAQs’ listing page
  • Fully modified FAQ Search
  • Captcha function available for better security
  • Get an email notification whenever there is a question from any user
  • Facility of sending an email notification to the user when the question has been answered
